name: Secure Azure Hub-and-Spoke Network
handle: securing hub-and-spoke azure networks with azure firewall and point-to-site vpn

body:
# Secure Azure Architecture

This project demonstrates **best practices** for deploying secure workloads on Azure.

## Key Features
- Hub-and-spoke networking
- Azure Firewall
- Cost optimization with FinOps

[Read more](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure)
